description: Detect the creation of a service with a service binary located in a suspicious directory
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
frack113
name: Service Binary in Suspicious Folder
query: ((((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/[Hh][Kk][Ll][Mm]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll][Ss][Ee][Tt]\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt]/ AND process.executable:(/.*\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff][Ll][Oo][Gg][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\$\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/) AND winlog.event_data.Details:(/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000000\)/ OR /[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000001\)/ OR /[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000002\)/))) OR ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/[Hh][Kk][Ll][Mm]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll][Ss][Ee][Tt]\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ii][Mm][Aa][Gg][Ee][Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:(/.*\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff][Ll][Oo][Gg][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\$\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/)))) AND (NOT process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Oo][Nn]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/))
